flawed_nl_solution:
His order came out to 7*200=$<<7*200=1400>>1400
So there was 1400-1000=$<<1400-1000=4000>>4000 that qualified for the discount
So his discount saved 4000*0.1=$<<4000*0.1=400>>400
So his purchase came out to 1400-400=$<<1400-400=1000>>1000

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 400, not 4000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
